comments: I had Dubin for two classes, American Gov. and Intl. Relations. If you enjoy raunchy humor and spending most of the class listening to stories, I highly suggest taking him for A. Gov. Maybe avoid Int. Rel., though. It\'s not his strong suit and the research paper had vague instructions and grading criteria. POL1510 though, is a 100% TAKE IT.

comments: He is by far the best teacher I have had at OCC. He actually cares about his students and wants every single one to get an A in his class. In this class you don\'t read a book to learn, just listen to his lectures and you will get an A on the exam. He always goes above and beyond with his students.
